definition[0]: used to say that something exists or happens
example[1]: There are a few things we need to discuss.
example[2]: There must be easier ways of doing this.
example[3]: There seems to be a lack of communication.
example[4]: There remain several questions still to be answered.
example[5]: Suddenly there was a loud explosion.
example[6]: They were all laughing when there came a knock at the door.
